elements.name: Hydrogen, Vodik
elements.summary: Hydrogen is the lightest element on the periodic table. Its monatomic form (H) is the most abundant chemical substance in the Universe, constituting roughly 75% of all baryonic mass.
elements.hrv_summary: Vodik je najlakši element u periodnom sustavu. Njegov jednoatomski oblik (H) je najobilnija kemijska tvar u Svemiru, čineđi oko 75% sve barionske mase.

elements.name: Helium, Helij
elements.appearance: colorless gas, exhibiting a red-orange glow when placed in a high-voltage electric field
elements.hrv_appearance: bezbojni plin, dobija crvenkasto-narančasti sjaj kada je postavljen u polje velike voltaže
elements.summary: It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless and non-toxic monatomic noble gas. It has the lowest boiling and melting points in the periodic table.
elements.hrv_summary: Helij je bezbojan, bezmirisan, bezokusan i ne toksičan jednoatomski plemeniti plin. Ima najnižu temperaturu taljenjenja i isparavanja u periodnom sustavu.

elements.name: Lithium, Litij
elements.summary: Lithium is a soft, silver-white metal belonging to the alkali metal group of chemical elements. Under standard conditions it is the lightest metal and the least dense solid element.
elements.hrv_summary: Litij je mekan, srebrenkasto-bijel metal koji pripada alkalijskim metalima. Pod standardnim uvjetima je najlakši metal i element s najmanjom gustoćom

elements.name: Beryllium, Berilij
elements.summary: It is created through nucleosynthesis and is a relatively rare element in the universe. It occurs naturally only in combination with other elements in minerals.
elements.hrv_summary: Berilij je napravljen kroz nukleosintezu i on je relativno rijedak element u svemiru. Samo se prirodno nalazi u kombinacijama s drugim elementima u rudama.

elements.name: Boron, Bor
elements.summary: Boron is produced entirely by cosmic ray spallation and supernovae, it is a low-abundance element in the Solar system and the Earth's crust. Boron is concentrated on Earth in the shape of borate minerals.
elements.hrv_summary: Bor je samo dobiven kozmičkim zračenjem i supernovama, te je rijedak element u Sunčevom sustavu i Zemljinoj kori. Bor je koncentriran u Zemlji u obliku borovih minerala.

elements.name: Carbon, Ugljik
elements.summary: Carbon is the first of six elements in group 14, which have in common the composition of their outer electron shell. It is nonmetallic and tetravalent making four electrons available to form covalent chemical bonds.
elements.hrv_summary: Ugljik je prvi od šest elemenata u skupini 14, koji imaju zajedničku kompoziciju svojih vanjskih elektronskih ljuski. On je tetravalentan zbog čega ima četiri elektrona slobodna za tvorenje kovalentnih veza.

elements.name: Nitrogen, Dušik
elements.hrv_appearance: bezbojan kao plin, tekućina ili krutina
elements.summary: Nitrogen is the lightest pnictogen and at room temperature, it is a transparent, odorless diatomic gas. Nitrogen is a common element in the universe, estimated at about seventh in total abundance in the Milky Way and the Solar System.
elements.hrv_summary: Dušik je najlakši lightest pniktogen pri sobnoj temperaturi, on je proziran i bezmirisan diatomičan plin. Dušik je uobičajan element u svemiru, procijenjen kao sedmi po količini u Mliječnoj stazi i Sunčevom sustavu.

elements.name: Oxygen, Kisik
elements.summary: Oxygen is a member of the chalcogen group on the periodic table and is a highly reactive nonmetal and oxidizing agent that readily forms compounds (notably oxides) with most elements. By mass, oxygen is the third-most abundant element in the universe, after hydrogen and helium.
elements.hrv_summary: Kisik je element halkogene skupine periodnog sustava i jako je reaktivan nemetal i oksidans koji tvori spojeve (okside ) sa večinom elemenata. Kisik je treći najobiliniji element u svemiru, poslije vodika i helija.

elements.name: Fluorine, Fluor
elements.summary: Fluorine is a chemical element with symbol F and atomic number 9. It is the lightest halogen and exists as a highly toxic pale yellow diatomic gas at standard conditions. As the most electronegative element, it is extremely reactive:almost all other elements, including some noble gases, form compounds with fluorine.
elements.hrv_summary: Fluor je najlakši halogen i postoji kao toksičan, žut diatomičan plin u standardnim uvjetima. Kao naj elektronegativniji element, jako je reaktivan: skoro svi ostali elementi, uključujući neke plemenite plinove, tvore spojeve s fluorom.

elements.name: Neon, Neon
elements.appearance: colorless gas exhibiting an orange-red glow when placed in a high voltage electric field
elements.hrv_appearance: bezbojni plin primajući narančasto-crvenkasti sjaj u polju visoke voltaže
elements.summary: Neon is a colorless, odorless, inert monatomic gas under standard conditions, with about two-thirds the density of air.
elements.hrv_summary: Neon je bezbojan, bezmirisan inertan jednoatomski plin pri standardnim uvjetima s dvije trećine gustoće zraka.

elements.name: Sodium, Natrij
elements.summary: Sodium is a soft, silver-white, highly reactive metal. In the Periodic table it is in column 1 (alkali metals), and shares with the other six elements in that column that it has a single electron in its outer shell, which it readily donates, creating a positively charged atom - a cation.
elements.hrv_summary: Natrij je mekan, srebrenkasto-bijeli, vrlo reaktivan metal. U preiodičnom sustavu spada u skupinu alkalijkih metala i s ostalih šest elemenata u toj skupini dijeli svojstvo jednog elektrona u vanjskoj ljusci kojeg rado otpušta, stvarajući pozitivan ion (kation).

elements.name: Magnesium, Magnezij
elements.summary: Magnesium is a shiny gray solid which bears a close physical resemblance to the other five elements in the second column (Group 2, or alkaline earth metals) of the periodic table:they each have the same electron configuration in their outer electron shell producing a similar crystal structure. Magnesium is the ninth most abundant element in the universe.
elements.hrv_summary: Magnezij je sjajno siva krutina koja izgleda slično ostalim elementima u zemnoalkalijskoj skupini: imaju istu elektronsku konfiguraciju u vanjskoj elektronskoj ljusci stvarajući sličnu kristalnu strukturu. Magnezij je deveti najobilniji element u svemiru.

elements.name: Aluminium, Aluminij
elements.summary: Aluminium is a silvery-white, soft, nonmagnetic, ductile metal. Aluminium is the third most abundant element (after oxygen and silicon), and the most abundant metal, in the Earth's crust.
elements.hrv_summary: Aluminij je srebrenkasto-bijel, mekan i nemagnetičan metal. Aluminij je treći najobilinij element, poslije kisika i silicija, i najobilatiji metal, u Zemljinoj kori.

elements.name: Silicon, Silicij
elements.summary: Silicon is a tetravalent metalloid. It is most used in the production of processors.
elements.hrv_summary: Silicij je tetravalentan polumetal. Najviše se koristi u izradnji procesora.

elements.name: Phosphorus, Fosfor
elements.appearance: colourless, waxy white, yellow, scarlet, red, violet, black
elements.hrv_appearance: bezbojan, bijel, žut, ljubičast, crven, crn
elements.summary: Phosphorus exists in two major forms, white phosphorus and red phosphorus, but due to its high reactivity, phosphorus is never found as a free element on Earth. Instead phosphorus-containing minerals are almost always present in their maximally oxidised state, as inorganic phosphate rocks.
elements.hrv_summary: Fosfor postoji u dva glavna oblika, bijeli fosfor i crveni fosfor, ali zbog svoje visoke reaktivnosti, fosfor nije nikad pronađen kao slobodan element u Zemlji, već minerali s fosforom su skoro uvijek u svojem maksimalno oksidirajućem obliku, kao neorganske fosfatske stijene.

elements.name: Sulfur, Sumpor
elements.summary: Sulfur is an abundant, multivalent non-metal. Under normal conditions, sulfur atoms form cyclic octatomic molecules with chemical formula S8.
elements.hrv_summary: Sumpor je obilat, multivalentan nemetal. Pod normalnim uvjetima, sumporovi atomi tvore kružne oktagonske molekule formule S8.

elements.name: Chlorine, Klor
elements.summary: Chlorine is in the halogen group and is the second lightest halogen following fluorine.
elements.hrv_summary: Klor spada u halogenu skupinu i drugi je najlakši element te skupine poslije flora.

elements.name: Argon, Argon
elements.appearance: colorless gas exhibiting a lilac/violet glow when placed in a high voltage electric field
elements.hrv_appearance: bezbojni plin primajući ljubičasti sjaj kada je postavljen u polje visoke voltaže
elements.summary: Argon is the third most common gas in the Earth's atmosphere, at 0.934% (9,340 ppmv), making it over twice as abundant as the next most common atmospheric gas, water vapor (which averages about 4000 ppmv, but varies greatly.
elements.hrv_summary: Argon je treći najčešći plin u Zemljinoj atmosferi, s 0.934% (9,340 ppmv), što ga ćini preko duplo češćim od sljedećeg najčešćeg plina, vodene pare.

elements.name: Potassium, Kalij
elements.summary: Potassium was first isolated from potash, the ashes of plants, from which its name is derived (potassium, potash). In the Periodic table, potassium is one of seven elements in column (group) 1 (alkali metals):they all have a single valence electron in their outer electron shell, which they readily give up to create an atom with a positive charge - a cation, and combine with anions to form salts.
elements.hrv_summary: Kalij je prvo izoliran od potaša, pepeo od biljaka, od kojeg dobiva ime (potassium, potash). U periodnom sustavu, kalij je jedan od 7 elemenata alkalijskih metala: svi imaju jedan valentan ion u vanjskoj ljusci, kojeg rado otpuštaju tvoreći pozitivan ion, spajanjem aniona i kationa dobivaju se soli.

elements.name: Calcium, Kalcij
elements.summary: Calcium is a soft gray alkaline earth metal, fifth-most-abundant element by mass in the Earth's crust. The ion Ca2+ is also the fifth-most-abundant dissolved ion in seawater by both molarity and mass, after sodium, chloride, magnesium, and sulfate.
elements.hrv_summary: Kalcij je mekan sivi zemnoalkalijski metali metal, peti najobilniji element po masi u Zemljinoj kori. Ion Ca2+ je također peti najobilniji disocirani ion u morskoj vodi po molarnosti i masi, poslije natrija, klora, magnezija, i sumpora.

elements.name: Scandium, Skandij
elements.summary: Scandium is a silvery-white metallic d-block element, it has historically been sometimes classified as a rare earth element, together with yttrium and the lanthanoids. It was discovered in 1879 by spectral analysis of the minerals euxenite and gadolinite from Scandinavia.
elements.hrv_summary: Skandij je srebrenkasto bijel metalik, povijesno je bio klasificiran kao rijedak zemni element, skupa sa itrijem i lantanoidima. Otkriven je 1879 spektralnom analziom minerala ekusenita i gadolinita iz Skandiavije.

elements.name: Titanium, Titanij
elements.summary: Titanium is  a lustrous transition metal with a silver color, low density and high strength. It is highly resistant to corrosion in sea water, aqua regia and chlorine.
elements.hrv_summary: Titanij je sjajan jak prijelazni metal sa srebrenom bojom i malom gustoćom. Jako je otporan koroziji u morskoj vodi i kloru.

elements.name: Vanadium, Vanadij
elements.summary: Vanadium is a hard, silvery grey, ductile and malleable transition metal. The element is found only in chemically combined form in nature, but once isolated artificially, the formation of an oxide layer stabilizes the free metal somewhat against further oxidation.
elements.hrv_summary: Vanadij je tvrd, srebrenkasto-siv, rastezljiv i siv prijelazni metal. Pronađen je samo u kemijskim spojevima u prirodi, ali nakon što je umjetno izdvojen, formacija oksidirajućeg sloja stabilizira slobodan meta protiv dodatne oksidacije.

elements.name: Chromiumm, Krom
elements.summary: Chromium is the first element in Group 6. It is a steely-gray, lustrous, hard and brittle metal. It also has a high melting point.
elements.hrv_summary: Krom je prvi element u 6. skupini. On je sivaksti, sjajni, tvrd i lomljiv meta. Također ima visoku točku taljenja.

elements.name: Manganese, Mangan
elements.summary: Manganese is not found as a free element in nature; it is often found in combination with iron, and in many minerals. Manganese is a metal with important industrial metal alloy uses, particularly in stainless steels.
elements.hrv_summary: Mangan nije u prirodi pronađen kao slobodan element, nego je često pronađen u spojevima s željezom i ostalim mineralima. Mangan je metal s velikom uporabom u industrijskim metalnim legurama, posebno u nehrđajućem ćeliku.

elements.name: Iron, Željezo
elements.appearance: lustrous metallic with a grayish tinge
elements.summary: Iron is by mass the most common element on Earth, forming much of Earth's outer and inner core.
elements.hrv_summary: Željezo je po masi najuobičaniji element u Zemlji, tvoreći većinu Zemljine vanjske i unutarnje jezgre.

elements.name: Cobalt, Kobalt
elements.summary: Cobalt, like nickel, in the Earth's crust is found only in chemically combined form, save for small deposits found in alloys of natural meteoric iron. The free element, produced by reductive smelting, is a hard, lustrous, silver-gray metal.
elements.hrv_summary: Kobalt, kao nikal, je u Zemljnoj kori samo pronađen u obliku kemijskih spojeva, osim malih all naslaga pronađenih u legurama prirodnog meteorskog željeza. Slobodan element, proizveden redlukcijskim taljenjem, je tvrd, sjajan, srebrenkasto-siv metal.

elements.name: Nickel, Nikal
elements.appearance: lustrous, metallic, and silver with a gold tinge
elements.summary: NIckel is a silvery-white lustrous metal with a slight golden tinge. Nickel belongs to the transition metals and is hard and ductile.
elements.hrv_summary: Nikal je srebrenkasto-bijel sjajan metal sa malom zlatnom nijansom. Nikal spada u prijelazne metale te je tvrd i savitljiv.

elements.name: Copper, Bakar
elements.summary: Copper is a soft, malleable and ductile metal with very high thermal and electrical conductivity. A freshly exposed surface of pure copper has a reddish-orange color.
elements.hrv_summary: Bakar je mekani, oblikovani i savitljivi metal s vrlo visokom toplinskom i električnom provodljivošću. Svježe izložena površina čistog bakra ima crvenkasto-narančastu boju.

elements.name: Zinc, Cink
elements.summary: Zinc is the first element of group 12 of the periodic table. In some respects zinc is chemically similar to magnesium:its ion is of similar size and its only common oxidation state is +2.
elements.hrv_summary: Cink je prvi element 12. skupine periodnog sustava. U nekim aspektima, kemijski je sličan magneziju: njegov ion je slične veličine, a jedino uobičajeno oksidacijsko stanje mu je +2.

elements.name: Gallium, Galij
elements.summary: Elemental gallium does not occur in free form in nature, but as the gallium(III) compounds that are in trace amounts in zinc ores and in bauxite. Gallium is a soft, silvery metal, and elemental gallium is a brittle solid at low temperatures, and melts at 29.76 °C (85.57 °F) (slightly above room temperature).
elements.hrv_summary: Elementarni galij ne pojavljuje se u slobodnom obliku u prirodi, već kao spojevi galija(III) koji se nalaze u tragovima u cinkovim rudama i boksitu. Galij je mekani, srebrni metal, a elementarni galij je krhki čvrsti materijal na niskim temperaturama i topi se na °C (85.57 °F) (nešto iznad sobne temperature).

elements.name: Germanium, Germanij
elements.summary: Germanium is a lustrous, hard, grayish-white metalloid in the carbon group, chemically similar to its group neighbors tin and silicon. Purified germanium is a semiconductor, with an appearance most similar to elemental silicon.
elements.hrv_summary: Germanium is a lustrous, hard, grayish-white metalloid in the carbon group, chemically similar to its group neighbors tin and silicon. Purified germanium is a semiconductor, with an appearance most similar to elemental silicon.

elements.name: Arsenic, Arsen
elements.summary: Arsenic occurs in many minerals, usually in conjunction with sulfur and metals, and also as a pure elemental crystal. Arsenic is a metalloid.
elements.hrv_summary: Arsen se pojavljuje u mnogim mineralima, obično u vezi sa sumporom i metalima, te također kao čisti elementarni kristal. Arsen je polumetal.

elements.name: Selenium, Selenij
elements.appearance: black, red, and gray (not pictured) allotropes
elements.summary: Selenium is a nonmetal with properties that are intermediate between those of its periodic table column-adjacent chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium. It rarely occurs in its elemental state in nature, or as pure ore compounds.
elements.hrv_summary: Selenij je nemetal sa svojstvima koja su između svojstava sumpora i telurija, elemenata u istom stupcu periodnog sustava. Rijetko se pojavljuje u svojem elementarnom stanju u prirodi ili kao čisti rudni spojevi.

elements.name: Bromine, Brom
elements.summary: Bromine is a halogen. The element was isolated independently by two chemists, Carl Jacob Löwig and Antoine Jerome Balard, in 1825–1826.
elements.hrv_summary: Brom je halogen. Element su neovisno izolirali dva kemičara, Carl Jacob Löwig i Antoine Jérôme Balard, 1825–1826. godine.

elements.name: Krypton, Kripton
elements.appearance: colorless gas, exhibiting a whitish glow in a high electric field
elements.summary: Krypton is a member of group 18 (noble gases) elements. A colorless, odorless, tasteless noble gas, krypton occurs in trace amounts in the atmosphere, is isolated by fractionally distilling liquefied air, and is often used with other rare gases in fluorescent lamps.
elements.hrv_summary: Kripton je član 18. skupine (plemeniti plinovi) elemenata. Bezbojan, bezmirisan, bezokusni plemeniti plin, kripton se pojavljuje u tragovima u atmosferi, izolira se frakcijskom destilacijom kondenziranog zraka, te se često koristi s drugim rijetkim plinovima u fluorescentnim lampama.

elements.name: Rubidium, Rubidij
elements.summary: Rubidium is a soft, silvery-white metallic element of the alkali metal group, with an atomic mass of 85.4678. Elemental rubidium is highly reactive, with properties similar to those of other alkali metals, such as very rapid oxidation in air.
elements.hrv_summary: Rubidij je mekani, srebrno-bijeli metalni element iz skupine alkalnih metala, s atomskom masom od 85,4678. Elementarni rubidij je vrlo reaktivan, s svojstvima sličnim drugim alkalnim metalima, poput vrlo brze oksidacije na zraku.

elements.name: Strontium, Stroncij
elements.summary: Strontium is an alkaline earth metal, it is a soft silver-white or yellowish metallic element that is highly reactive chemically. The metal turns yellow when it is exposed to air.
elements.hrv_summary: Stroncij je metal alkalnih zemljanih metala, to je mekani srebrno-bijeli ili žućkasti metalni element koji je visoko kemijski reaktivan. Metal postaje žut kada je izložen zraku.

elements.name: Yttrium, Itrij
elements.summary: Yttrium is a silvery-metallic transition metal chemically similar to the lanthanides and it has often been classified as a "rare earth element". Yttrium is almost always found combined with the lanthanides in rare earth minerals and is never found in nature as a free element.
elements.hrv_summary: Itrij je srebrno-metalni prijelazni metal kemijski sličan lantanidima i često je klasificiran kao rijedak zemni element. Iterbij se gotovo uvijek nalazi u kombinaciji s lantanidima u mineralima rijetkih zemalja i nikada se ne nalazi prirodi kao slobodan element.

elements.name: Zirconium, Cirkonij
elements.summary: Zirconium gets its name of zirconium is taken from the name of the mineral zircon, the most important source of zirconium. The word zircon comes from the Persian word zargun زرگون, meaning "gold-colored".
elements.hrv_summary: Cirkonij je nazvan prema mineralu cirkon, najvažnijem izvoru cirkonija. Riječ cirkon potječe od perzijske riječi zargun, što znači "zlatno obojano".

elements.name: Niobium, Niobij
elements.summary: Niobium is a soft, grey, ductile transition metal, which is often found in the pyrochlore mineral, the main commercial source for niobium, and columbite. The name comes from Greek mythology:Niobe, daughter of Tantalus since it is so similar to tantalum.
elements.hrv_summary: Niobij je mekani, sivi, duktilni prijelazni metal koji se često nalazi u mineralu pijrohloru, glavnom komercijalnom izvoru niobija, i kolumbitu. Naziv potječe iz grčke mitologije: Nioba, kći Tantala, jer je tako sličan tantaliju.

elements.name: Molybdenum, Molibden
elements.summary: Molybdenum gets its name from Neo-Latin molybdaenum, from Ancient Greek molybdos, meaning lead, since its ores were confused with lead ores. Molybdenum minerals have been known throughout history, but the element was discovered (in the sense of differentiating it as a new entity from the mineral salts of other metals) in 1778 by Carl Wilhelm Scheele.
elements.hrv_summary: Molibden dobiva svoje ime iz neolatinskog molybdaenum, iz drevnog grčkog molybdos, što znači olovo, jer su njegovi rude bile zbunjujuće s rudama olova. Minerali molibdena poznati su kroz povijest, ali element je otkriven (u smislu razlikovanja kao novog entiteta od mineralnih soli drugih metala) 1778. godine od strane Carla Wilhelma Scheelea.

elements.name: Technetium, Tehnecij
elements.summary: Technetium is the element with the lowest atomic number in the periodic table that has no stable isotopes:every form of it is radioactive. Nearly all technetium is produced synthetically, and only minute amounts are found in nature.
elements.hrv_summary: Tehnecij je element s najnižim atomskim brojem u periodnom sustavu elemenata koji nema stabilne izotope: svaki oblik njega je radioaktivan. Skoro sav tehnecij se proizvodi sintetički, a samo se vrlo male količine nalaze u prirodi.

elements.name: Ruthenium, Rutenij
elements.summary: Ruthenium is a rare transition metal belonging to the platinum group of the periodic table. Like the other metals of the platinum group, ruthenium is inert to most other chemicals.
elements.hrv_summary: Rutenij je rijedak prijelazni metal koji pripada platinastoj skupini periodnog sustava elemenata. Kao i drugi metali platinaste skupine, rutenij je inertan prema većini drugih kemikalija.

elements.name: Rhodium, Rodij
elements.summary: Rhodium is a rare, silvery-white, hard, and chemically inert transition metal. It is a member of the platinum group.
elements.hrv_summary: Rodij je rijedak, srebrno-bijeli, tvrdi i kemijski inertni prijelazni metal. Član je platinaste skupine.

elements.name: Palladium, Paladij
elements.summary: Palladium is a rare and lustrous silvery-white metal discovered in 1803 by William Hyde Wollaston. He named it after the asteroid Pallas, which was itself named after the epithet of the Greek goddess Athena, acquired by her when she slew Pallas.
elements.hrv_summary: Paladij je rijedak i sjajan srebrno-bijeli metal otkriven 1803. godine od strane Williama Hydea Wollastona. Nazvao ga je po asteroidu Pallas, koji je sam dobio ime po epitetu grčke božice Atena, koji je stekla kad je ubila Palasa.

elements.name: Silver, Srebro
elements.summary: Silver is a soft, white, lustrous transition metal, it possesses the highest electrical conductivity, thermal conductivity and reflectivity of any metal. The metal occurs naturally in its pure, free form (native silver), as an alloy with gold and other metals, and in minerals such as argentite and chlorargyrite.
elements.hrv_summary: Srebro je mekani, bijeli, sjajni prijelazni metal, posjeduje najveću električnu provodljivost, toplinsku provodljivost i reflektivnost od bilo kojeg metala. Metal se prirodno pojavljuje u svojem čistom, slobodnom obliku (prirodno srebro), kao legura s ​​zlatom i drugim metalima, te u mineralima poput argentita i klorargirit.

elements.name: Cadmium, Kadmij
elements.summary: Cadmium is a soft, bluish-white metal which is chemically similar to the two other stable metals in group 12, zinc and mercury. Like zinc, it prefers oxidation state +2 in most of its compounds and like mercury it shows a low melting point compared to transition metals.
elements.hrv_summary: Kadmij je mekani, plavkasto-bijeli metal koji je kemijski sličan druga dva stabilna metala u skupini 12, cinku i živu. Poput cinka, preferira oksidacijsko stanje +2 u većini svojih spojeva, a poput žive pokazuje nisku točku taljenja u usporedbi s prijelaznim metalima.

elements.name: Indium, Indij
elements.summary: Indium is a post-transition metallic element that is rare in Earth's crust. The metal is very soft, malleable and easily fusible, with a melting point higher than sodium, but lower than lithium or tin.
elements.hrv_summary: Indij je slab metalni element koji je rijedak u Zemljinoj kori. Metal je vrlo mekan, oblikovljiv i lako se spaja, s točkom taljenja višom od natrija, ali nižom od litija ili kositra.

elements.name: Tin, Kositar
elements.summary: Tin is a main group metal in group 14 of the periodic table. Tin shows a chemical similarity to both neighboring group-14 elements, germanium and lead, and has two possible oxidation states, +2 and the slightly more stable +4.
elements.hrv_summary: Kositar je metal glavne skupine u skupini 14 periodnog sustava. Kositra pokazuje kemijsku sličnost s oba susjedna elementa u skupini 14, germanijem i olovom, te ima dvije moguća oksidacijska stanja, +2 i nešto stabilnije +4.

elements.name: Antimony, Antimon
elements.summary: Antimony is a lustrous gray metalloid, it is found in nature mainly as the sulfide mineral stibnite (Sb2S3). Antimony compounds have been known since ancient times and were used for cosmetics; metallic antimony was also known, but it was erroneously identified as lead upon its discovery.
elements.hrv_summary: Antimon je sjajni sivi metaloid, nalazi se u prirodi uglavnom kao sulfidni mineral stibnit (Sb2S3). Antimonski spojevi poznati su od davnina i koristili su se u kozmetici; također je bio poznat i metalni antimon, ali je pogrešno identificiran kao olovo prilikom otkrića.

elements.name: Tellurium, Telurij
elements.summary: Tellurium is a brittle, mildly toxic, rare, silver-white metalloid. It is chemically related to selenium and sulfur.
elements.hrv_summary: Telur je krhki, blago toksični, rijetki, srebrno-bijeli metaloid. Kemijski je povezan sa selenom i sumporom.

elements.name: Iodine, Jod
elements.appearance: lustrous metallic gray, violet as a gas
elements.summary: Iodine gets its name is from Greek ioeidēs, meaning violet or purple, due to the color of iodine vapor. Iodine and its compounds are primarily used in nutrition, and industrially in the production of acetic acid and certain polymers.
elements.hrv_summary: Jod dobiva ime od grčke riječi ioeidēs, što znači ljubičasto ili purpurno, zbog boje pare joda. Jod i njegovi spojevi se uglavnom koriste u prehrani, te industrijski u proizvodnji octene kiseline i određenih polimera.

elements.name: Xenon, Ksenon
elements.appearance: colorless gas, exhibiting a blue glow when placed in a high voltage electric field
elements.summary: Xenon is a colorless, dense, odorless noble gas, that occurs in the Earth's atmosphere in trace amounts. Although generally unreactive, xenon can undergo a few chemical reactions such as the formation of xenon hexafluoroplatinate, the first noble gas compound to be synthesized.
elements.hrv_summary: Ksenon je bezbojni, gusti, bezmirisni plemeniti plin koji se pojavljuje u tragovima u Zemljinoj atmosferi. Iako općenito ne reagira, ksenon može proći nekoliko kemijskih reakcija poput formiranja ksenon heksafluoroplatinata, prvog spoja plemenitog plina koji je sintetiziran.

elements.name: Cesium, Cezij
elements.summary: Caesium is a soft, silvery-gold alkali metal with a melting point of 28 °C (82 °F), which makes it one of only five elemental metals that are liquid at or near room temperature. Caesium is an alkali metal and has physical and chemical properties similar to those of rubidium and potassium.
elements.hrv_summary: Cezij je mekani, srebrno-zlatni alkalijski metal s točkom taljenja od 28 °C (82 °F), što ga čini jednim od samo pet elementarnih metala koji su tekući pri ili blizu sobne temperature. Cezij je alkalijski metal i ima fizička i kemijska svojstva slična onima rubidija i kalija.

elements.name: Barium, Barij
elements.summary: Barium is the fifth element in group 2, a soft silvery metallic alkaline earth metal. Because of its high chemical reactivity barium is never found in nature as a free element.
elements.hrv_summary: Barij je peti element u 2. skupini, mekani srebrnasti metalik alkalnozemni metal. Zbog visoke kemijske reaktivnosti, barij se nikada ne nalazi u prirodi kao slobodan element.

elements.name: Lanthanum, Lantan
elements.summary: Lanthanum is a soft, ductile, silvery-white metallic chemical element. It tarnishes rapidly when exposed to air and is soft enough to be cut with a knife. It gave its name to the lanthanide series, a group of 15 similar elements between lanthanum and lutetium in the periodic table:it is also sometimes considered the first element of the 6th-period transition metals.
elements.hrv_summary: Lantan je mekani, duktilni, srebrno-bijeli kemijski element. Brzo oksidira kada je izložen zraku i dovoljno je mekan da se može rezati nožem. Dao je ime lantanidnoj seriji, skupini od 15 sličnih elemenata između lantana i luteecija u periodnom sustavu elemenata: također se ponekad smatra prvim elementom prijelaznih metala 6. perioda.

elements.name: Cerium, Cerij
elements.summary: Cerium is a soft, silvery, ductile metal which easily oxidizes in air. Cerium was named after the dwarf planet Ceres (itself named after the Roman goddess of agriculture).
elements.hrv_summary: Cerij je mekani, srebrni, duktilni metal koji se lako oksidira na zraku. Cerij je dobio ime po patuljastom planetu Ceresu (koji je sam dobio ime po rimskoj božici poljoprivrede).

elements.name: Praseodymium, Praseodimij
elements.summary: Praseodymium is a soft, silvery, malleable and ductile metal in the lanthanide group. It is valued for its magnetic, electrical, chemical, and optical properties.
elements.hrv_summary: Praseodim je mekani, srebrni, lagan za oblikovanje i duktilni metal u lanthanidnoj grupi. Cijeni se zbog svojih magnetskih, električnih, kemijskih i optičkih svojstava.

elements.name: Neodymium, Neodimij
elements.summary: Neodymium is a soft silvery metal that tarnishes in air. Neodymium was discovered in 1885 by the Austrian chemist Carl Auer von Welsbach.
elements.hrv_summary: Neodim je mekani srebrni metal koji potamni na zraku. Neodim je otkrio austrijski kemičar Carl Auer von Welsbach 1885. godine.

elements.name: Promethium, Prometij
elements.summary: All of promethium's isotopes are radioactive; it is one of only two such elements that are followed in the periodic table by elements with stable forms, a distinction shared with technetium. Chemically, promethium is a lanthanide, which forms salts when combined with other elements.
elements.hrv_summary: Svi izotopi prometija su radioaktivni; on je jedan od samo dva takva elementa koji su u periodnom sustavu praćeni elementima s stabilnim oblicima, što je posebnost koju dijeli s tehnicijem. Kemijski, prometij je lantanid, koji tvori soli kada se kombinira s drugim elementima.

elements.name: Samarium, Samarij
elements.summary: Samarium is a moderately hard silvery metal that readily oxidizes in air. Being a typical member of the lanthanide series, samarium usually assumes the oxidation state +3.
elements.hrv_summary: Samarij je umjereno tvrdi srebrni metal koji se lako oksidira na zraku. Kao tipični član lanthanoidnog niza, samarit obično preuzima oksidacijsko stanje +3.

elements.name: Europium, Europij
elements.summary: Europium was isolated in 1901 and is named after the continent of Europe. It is a moderately hard, silvery metal which readily oxidizes in air and water.
elements.hrv_summary: Europij je izoliran 1901. godine i nazvan je po kontinentu Europi. To je umjereno tvrdi, srebrni metal koji se lako oksidira na zraku i u vodi.

elements.name: Gadolinium, Gadolinij
elements.summary: Gadolinium is a silvery-white, malleable and ductile rare-earth metal. It is found in nature only in combined (salt) form.
elements.hrv_summary: Gadolinij je srebrno-bijeli, oblikovljiv i duktilni metal rijetkih zemalja. Prirodno se nalazi samo u kombiniranom (solnom) obliku.

elements.name: Terbium, Terbij
elements.summary: Terbium is a silvery-white rare earth metal that is malleable, ductile and soft enough to be cut with a knife. It is never found in nature as a free element, but it is contained in many minerals, including cerite, gadolinite, monazite, xenotime and euxenite.
elements.hrv_summary: Terbij je srebrno-bijeli metal rijetkih zemalja koji je oblikovljiv, duktilan i dovoljno mekan da se može rezati nožem. Nikada se ne nalazi prirodi kao slobodni element, ali se nalazi u mnogim mineralima, uključujući cerit, gadolinit, monazit, ksenotim i euksenit.

elements.name: Dysprosium, Disprozij
elements.summary: Dysprosium is a rare earth element with a metallic silver luster. It is never found in nature as a free element, though it is found in various minerals, such as xenotime.
elements.hrv_summary: Dizprozij je rijedak element rijetkih zemalja s metalnim srebrenom sjajem. Nikada se ne nalazi prirodi kao slobodni element, iako se nalazi u raznim mineralima, poput ksenotima.

elements.name: Holmium, Holmij
elements.summary: Holmium is a rare earth element and it was discovered by Swedish chemist Per Theodor Cleve.
elements.hrv_summary: Holmij je element rijetkih zemalja otkriven od strane švedskog kemičara Pera Theodora Clevea.

elements.name: Erbium, Erbij
elements.summary: Erbium it is a silvery-white solid metal when artificially isolated, natural erbium is always found in chemical combination with other elements on Earth. As such, it is a rare earth element which is associated with several other rare elements in the mineral gadolinite from Ytterby in Sweden, where yttrium, ytterbium, and terbium were discovered.
elements.hrv_summary: Erbij je srebrno-bijeli čvrsti metal kada je umjetno izoliran, prirodni erbij uvijek se nalazi u kemijskoj kombinaciji s drugim elementima na Zemlji. Stoga je to rijedak element rijetkih zemalja koji je povezan s nekoliko drugih rijetkih elemenata u mineralu gadolinitu iz Ytterbyja u Švedskoj, gdje su otkriveni iterbij, itrij i terbij.

elements.name: Thulium, Tulij
elements.summary: Thulium is the thirteenth and antepenultimate (third-last) element in the lanthanide series. Like the other lanthanides, the most common oxidation state is +3, seen in its oxide, halides and other compounds.
elements.hrv_summary: Tulij je trinaesti i predzadnji (treći od posljednjeg) element u lanthanoidnom nizu. Kao i drugi lantanoidi, najčešće oksidacijsko stanje je +3, prisutno u njegovom oksidu, halidima i drugim spojevima.

elements.name: Ytterbium, Iterbij
elements.summary: Ytterbium is the fourteenth and penultimate element in the lanthanide series, which is the basis of the relative stability of its +2 oxidation state. However, like the other lanthanides, its most common oxidation state is +3, seen in its oxide, halides and other compounds.
elements.hrv_summary: Iterbij je četrnaesti i predzadnji element u lanthanoidnom nizu, što je osnova relativne stabilnosti njegovog oksidacijskog stanja +2. Međutim, kao i drugi lantanidi, njegovo najčešće oksidacijsko stanje je +3, prisutno u njegovom oksidu, halidima i drugim spojevima.

elements.name: Lutetium, Lutecij
elements.summary: Lutetium is a silvery white metal, which resists corrosion in dry, but not in moist air. It is considered the first element of the 6th-period transition metals and the last element in the lanthanide series, and is traditionally counted among the rare earths.
elements.hrv_summary: Lutecij je srebrno-bijeli metal koji pruža otpornost na koroziju u suhom, ali ne i u vlažnom zraku. Smatra se prvim elementom prijelaznih metala 6. perioda i posljednjim elementom u lanthanoidnom nizu, te se tradicionalno ubraja među rijetke zemlje.

elements.name: Hafnium, Hafnij
elements.summary: Hafnium is a lustrous, silvery gray, tetravalent transition metal, chemically it resembles zirconium and is found in zirconium minerals. Its existence was predicted by Dmitri Mendeleev in 1869, though it was not identified until 1923, making it the penultimate stable element to be discovered (rhenium was identified two years later).
elements.hrv_summary: Hafnij je sjajni, srebrno sivi tetravalentni prijelazni metal koji kemijski podsjeća na cirkonij i nalazi se u mineralima cirkonija. Njegovo postojanje je predvidio Dmitrij Mendeljejev 1869. godine, iako nije identificiran sve do 1923. godine, što ga čini predposljednim stabilnim elementom koji je otkriven (rehij je identificiran dvije godine kasnije).

elements.name: Tantalum, Tantal
elements.summary: Tantalum, previously known as tantalium, gets its name comes from Tantalus, an antihero from Greek mythology. Tantalum is a rare, hard, blue-gray, lustrous transition metal that is highly corrosion-resistant.
elements.hrv_summary: Tantal, ranije poznat kao tantalij, dobiva svoje ime po Tantalusu, antiheroju iz grčke mitologije. Tantal je rijedak, tvrd, plavo-sivi, sjajni prijelazni metal koji je izuzetno otporan na koroziju.

elements.name: Tungsten, Volfram
elements.summary: The word tungsten comes from the Swedish language tung sten, which directly translates to heavy stone. Its name in Swedish is volfram, however, in order to distinguish it from scheelite, which in Swedish is alternatively named tungsten.
elements.hrv_summary: Riječ "wolfram" potječe iz švedskog jezika "tung sten", što se direktno prevodi kao "težak kamen". Njegovo ime na švedskom je "volfram", međutim, kako bi ga razlikovali od šejtelita, koji se na švedskom ponekad naziva tungsten.

elements.name: Rhenium, Renij
elements.summary: Rhenium is a silvery-white, heavy, third-row transition metal in group 7 of the periodic table. With an estimated average concentration of 1 part per billion (ppb), it is one of the rarest elements in the Earth's crust.
elements.hrv_summary: Renij je srebrno-bijeli, težak, prijelazni metal trećeg reda u 7. grupi periodnog sustava. S procijenjenom prosječnom koncentracijom od 1 dio na milijardu (ppb), to je jedan od najrjeđih elemenata u Zemljinoj kori.

elements.name: Osmium, Osmij
elements.summary: Osmium is a hard, brittle, bluish-white transition metal in the platinum group that is found as a trace element in alloys, mostly in platinum ores. It is the densest naturally occurring element, with a density of 22.59 g/cm3.
elements.hrv_summary: Osmij je tvrdi, lomljivi, plavo-bijeli prijelazni metal u platinastoj skupini koji se nalazi kao tragoviti element u slitinama, uglavnom u rudama platine. To je najgušći prirodno prisutni element, s gustoćom od 22,59 g/cm3.

elements.name: Iridium, Iridij
elements.summary: Iridium, a silvery-white transition metal, is among the densest elements, rivaling osmium. Renowned for its hardness, it exhibits exceptional corrosion resistance, enduring temperatures up to 2000°C. While solid iridium is largely immune to corrosion, finely divided dust can be reactive and flammable.
elements.hrv_summary: Iridij, srebrno-bijeli prijelazni metal, među je najgušćim elementima, natječući se s osmijem. Poznat po svojoj tvrdoći, pokazuje izuzetnu otpornost na koroziju, izdržavajući temperature do 2000  °C. Iako je čvrsti iridij uglavnom imun na koroziju, fino podijeljeni prah može biti reaktivan i zapaljiv.

elements.name: Platinum, Platina
elements.summary: Platinum is a dense, malleable, ductile, highly unreactive, precious, gray-white transition metal. Its name is derived from the Spanish term platina, which is literally translated into "little silver".
elements.hrv_summary: Platina je gusta, oblikovljiva, duktilna, visoko neaktivna, dragocjena, sivo-bijela prijelazni metal. Njeno ime potječe od španjolskog izraza "platina", što se doslovno prevodi kao "malo srebro".

elements.name: Gold, Zlato
elements.summary: Gold in its purest form, it is a bright, slightly reddish yellow, dense, soft, malleable and ductile metal. Chemically, gold is a transition metal and a group 11 element.
elements.hrv_summary: Zlato u svojem najčišćem obliku je svijetlo, blago crvenkasto žuto, gusta, meka, oblikovljiva i duktilna kovina. Kemijski, zlato je prijelazni metal i element 11. skupine.

elements.name: Mercury, Živa
elements.summary: Mercury is commonly known as quicksilver and was formerly named hydrargyrum. A heavy, silvery d-block element, mercury is the only metallic element that is liquid at standard conditions for temperature and pressure; the only other element that is liquid under these conditions is bromine, though metals such as caesium, gallium, and rubidium melt just above room temperature.
elements.hrv_summary: Živa je poznata kao živino i nekada je nazivana hidrargirij. Teški, srebrni d-element, živa je jedini metalni element koji je tekuć pri standardnim uvjetima temperature i tlaka; jedini drugi element koji je tekuć pod ovim uvjetima je brom, iako metali poput cezija, galija i rubidija tope se malo iznad sobne temperature.

elements.name: Thallium, Talij
elements.summary: Thallium is a soft gray post-transition metal that is not found free in nature. When isolated, it resembles tin, but discolors when exposed to air.
elements.hrv_summary: Talij je mekani sivi post-prijelazni metal koji se ne nalazi slobodan u prirodi. Kada je izoliran, sličan je kositru, ali mijenja boju kad je izložen zraku.

elements.name: Lead, Olovo
elements.summary: Lead is a soft, malleable and heavy post-transition metal. Metallic lead has a bluish-white color after being freshly cut, but it soon tarnishes to a dull grayish color when exposed to air.
elements.hrv_summary: Olovo je mekani, oblikovljiv i težak post-prijelazni metal. Metalno olovo ima plavo-bijelu boju nakon što se svježe izreže, ali brzo potamni u mutno sivu boju kada je izloženo zraku.

elements.name: Bismuth, Bizmut
elements.summary: Bismuth, a pentavalent post-transition metal, chemically resembles arsenic and antimony. Elemental bismuth may occur naturally, although its sulfide and oxide form important commercial ores.
elements.hrv_summary: Bizmut, pentavalentni slabi metal, kemijski sliči arseniku i antimoniju. Elementalni bizmut može se prirodno pojaviti, iako njegovi sulfidni i oksidni oblici čine važne komercijalne rude.

elements.name: Polonium, Polonij
elements.summary: Polonium was discovered in 1898 by Marie Curie and Pierre Curie. It is a rare and highly radioactive element with no stable isotopes, polonium is chemically similar to bismuth and tellurium, and it occurs in uranium ores. Applications of polonium are few.
elements.hrv_summary: Polonij je otkriven 1898. godine od strane Marie Curie i Pierre Curie. Rijedak je i visoko radioaktivan element bez stabilnih izotopa, kemijski je sličan bizmutu i teluru, i nalazi se u uranskim rudama. Primjene polonija su rijetke.

elements.name: Astatine, Astat
elements.summary: Astatine is a very rare radioactive chemical element and it occurs on Earth as the decay product of various heavier elements. All its isotopes are short-lived; the most stable is astatine-210, with a half-life of 8.1 hours.
elements.hrv_summary: Astat je vrlo rijedak radioaktivni kemijski element i pojavljuje se na Zemlji kao proizvod raspada različitih težih elemenata. Svi njegovi izotopi kratkog su vijeka; najstabilniji je astacin-210, s poluživotom od 8,1 sati.

elements.name: Radon, Radon
elements.appearance: colorless gas, occasionally glows green or red in discharge tubes
elements.summary: Radon is a radioactive, colorless, odorless, tasteless noble gas, occurring naturally as a decay product of radium. Its most stable isotope, 222Rn, has a half-life of 3.8 days.
elements.hrv_summary: Radon je radioaktivni, bezbojni, bezmirisni, bezukusni plemeniti plin koji se prirodno pojavljuje kao produkt raspada radija. Njegov najstabilniji izotop, 222Rn, ima poluživot od 3,8 dana.

elements.name: Francium, Francij
elements.summary: Francium used to be known as eka-caesium and actinium K. It is the second-least electronegative element, behind only caesium. Francium is a highly radioactive metal that decays into astatine, radium, and radon.
elements.hrv_summary: Francij je nekad bio poznat kao eka-cezij i aktinij K. To je drugi najmanje elektronegativni element, iza samo cezija. Francij je visoko radioaktivni metal koji se raspada u astacin, radij i radon.

elements.name: Radium, Radij
elements.summary: Radium is the sixth element in group 2 of the periodic table, also known as the alkaline earth metals. Pure radium is almost colorless, but it readily combines with nitrogen (rather than oxygen) on exposure to air, forming a black surface layer of radium nitride (Ra3N2).
elements.hrv_summary: Radij je šesti element u skupini 2 periodnog sustava, također poznat kao alkalni zemljani metali. Čisti radij je gotovo bezbojan, ali se lako kombinira s dušikom (umjesto kisika) na izloženosti zraku, tvoreći crni površinski sloj radijeva nitrida (Ra3N2).

elements.name: Actinium, Aktinij
elements.summary: Actinium was discovered in 1899. It was the first non-primordial radioactive element to be isolated. Polonium, radium and radon were observed before actinium, but they were not isolated until 1902.
elements.hrv_summary: Actinium was discovered in 1899. It was the first non-primordial radioactive element to be isolated. Polonium, radium and radon were observed before actinium, but they were not isolated until 1902.

elements.name: Thorium, Torij
elements.summary: Thorium, a radioactive actinide metal, is one of only two significantly radioactive elements found naturally in large quantities as a primordial element, the other being uranium. Discovered in 1828 by Morten Thrane Esmark, a Norwegian Reverend and amateur mineralogist, it was named by Swedish chemist Jöns Jakob Berzelius after Thor, the Norse god of thunder.
elements.hrv_summary: Torij, radioaktivni aktinidni metal, jedan je od samo dva značajno radioaktivna elementa koji se prirodno nalaze u velikim količinama kao primordijalni element, drugi je uran. Otkriven 1828. godine od strane Mortena Thranea Esmarka, norveškog svećenika i amaterskog mineraloga, nazvan je po švedskom kemičaru Jönsu Jakobu Berzeliusu prema Thoru, nordijskom bogu groma.

elements.name: Protactinium, Protaktinij
elements.summary: Protactinium is a dense, silvery-gray metal which readily reacts with oxygen, water vapor and inorganic acids. It forms various chemical compounds where protactinium is usually present in the oxidation state +5, but can also assume +4 and even +2 or +3 states.
elements.hrv_summary: Protaktinij je gusta, srebrnosiva kovina koja lako reagira s kisikom, vodenom parom i neorganskim kiselinama. On tvori različite kemijske spojeve gdje je protaktinij obično prisutan u oksidacijskom stanju +5, ali može preuzeti i +4 pa čak i +2 ili +3 stanja.

elements.name: Uranium, Uranij
elements.summary: Uranium is a silvery-white metal in the actinide series of the periodic table. A uranium atom has 92 protons and 92 electrons, of which 6 are valence electrons.
elements.hrv_summary: Uran je srebrno-bijeli metal u aktinidnom nizu periodnog sustava. Atom urana ima 92 protona i 92 elektrona, od kojih je 6 valentnih elektrona.

elements.name: Neptunium, Neptunij
elements.summary: Neptunium is a radioactive actinide metal and it is the first transuranic element. Its position in the periodic table just after uranium, named after the planet Uranus, led to it being named after Neptune, the next planet beyond Uranus.
elements.hrv_summary: Neptunij je radioaktivni aktinidni metal i prvi je transuranij element. Njegova pozicija u periodnom sustavu odmah nakon urana, koji je nazvan po planetu Uranu, dovela je do toga da bude nazvan po Neptunu, sljedećem planetu iza Urana.

elements.name: Plutonium, Plutonij
elements.appearance: silvery white, tarnishing to dark gray in air
elements.summary: Plutonium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element. It is an actinide metal of silvery-gray appearance that tarnishes when exposed to air, and forms a dull coating when oxidized. The element normally exhibits six allotropes and four oxidation states.
elements.hrv_summary: Plutonij je transurani radioaktivni kemijski element. To je aktinidni metal s izgledom srebrno-sivih boja koji potamni kad je izložen zraku i tvori mutni premaz kada je oksidiran. Element obično pokazuje šest alotropa i četiri oksidacijska stanja.

elements.name: Americium, Ameriicj
elements.summary: Americium is a radioactive transuranic chemical element. This member of the actinide series is located in the periodic table under the lanthanide element europium, and thus by analogy was named after the Americas. Americium was first produced in 1944 by the group of Glenn T.Seaborg from Berkeley, California, at the metallurgical laboratory of University of Chicago.
elements.hrv_summary: Americij je radioaktivni transuranski kemijski element. Ovaj član aktinidnog niza nalazi se u periodnom sustavu ispod elementa lantanida europija, te je stoga, prema analogiji, dobio ime po Americi. Americij je prvi put proizveden 1944. godine od strane grupe koju je vodio Glenn T. Seaborg iz Berkeleya, Kalifornija, u metalurškom laboratoriju Sveučilišta u Chicagu.

elements.name: Curium, Kurij
elements.appearance: silvery metallic, glows purple in the dark
elements.summary: Curium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element. This element of the actinide series was named after Marie and Pierre Curie – both were known for their research on radioactivity. Curium was first intentionally produced and identified in July 1944 by the group of Glenn T. Seaborg at the University of California, Berkeley.
elements.hrv_summary: Kurij je transuranski radioaktivni kemijski element. Ovaj element aktinidnog niza dobio je ime po Marie i Pierre Curie – oboje su bili poznati po svojim istraživanjima radioaktivnosti. Kurij je prvi put namjerno proizveden i identificiran u srpnju 1944. godine od strane grupe Glenn T. Seaborga na Sveučilištu u Kaliforniji, Berkeley.

elements.name: Berkelium, Berkelij
elements.summary: Berkelium is a transuranic radioactive chemical element. It is a member of the actinide and transuranium element series. It is named after the city of Berkeley, California, the location of the University of California Radiation Laboratory where it was discovered in December 1949.
elements.hrv_summary: Berkelij je transuranski radioaktivni kemijski element. Član je aktinidne i transuranskog niza elemenata. Dobio je ime po gradu Berkeleyu, Kalifornija, mjestu gdje se nalazi Laboratorij za zračenje Sveučilišta u Kaliforniji, gdje je otkriven u prosincu 1949. godine.

elements.name: Californium, Kalifornij
elements.summary: Californium, a radioactive metallic element, was synthesized in 1950 at the University of California Radiation Laboratory in Berkeley by bombarding curium with alpha particles. It's an actinide, the sixth transuranium element created, with the second-highest atomic mass among elements produced in visible quantities (after einsteinium).
elements.hrv_summary: Kalifornij, radioaktivni metalni element, sintetiziran je 1950. godine na Laboratoriju za zračenje Sveučilišta u Kaliforniji u Berkeleyu bombardiranjem kurija alfa česticama. To je aktinid, šesti transurani element stvoren, s drugom najvećom atomskom masom među elementima proizvedenima u vidljivim količinama (nakon einsteinija).

elements.name: Einsteinium, Einsteinij
elements.summary: Einsteinium is a synthetic element and it is the seventh transuranic element, and an actinide. Einsteinium was discovered as a component of the debris of the first hydrogen bomb explosion in 1952, and named after Albert Einstein.
elements.hrv_summary: Einsteinij je sintetički element i sedmi transuranski element, te aktinid. Einsteinij je otkriven kao komponenta ostataka prve eksplozije vodikove bombe 1952. godine, i nazvan po Albertu Einsteinu.

elements.name: Fermium, Fermij
elements.summary: Fermium is a synthetic element and it is a member of the actinide series. It is the heaviest element that can be formed by neutron bombardment of lighter elements, and hence the last element that can be prepared in macroscopic quantities, although pure fermium metal has not yet been prepared.
elements.hrv_summary: Fermij je sintetički element i član je aktinidnog niza. To je najteži element koji se može formirati bombardiranjem neutrona lakših elemenata, te je stoga posljednji element koji se može pripremiti u makroskopskim količinama, iako čisti fermijev metal još nije pripremljen.

elements.name: Mendelevium, Mendelevij
elements.summary: Mendelevium is a synthetic element and it is a metallic radioactive transuranic element in the actinide series, it is the first element that currently cannot be produced in macroscopic quantities through neutron bombardment of lighter elements. It is the antepenultimate actinide and the ninth transuranic element.
elements.hrv_summary: Mendelevij je sintetički element i metalni radioaktivni transuranski element u aktinidnom nizu, prvi element koji trenutno ne može biti proizveden u makroskopskim količinama bombardiranjem neutrona lakših elemenata. To je predzadnji aktinid i deveti transuranski element.

elements.name: Nobelium, Nobelij
elements.summary: Nobelium is a synthetic chemical element and it is named in honor of Alfred Nobel, the inventor of dynamite and benefactor of science. A radioactive metal, it is the tenth transuranic element and is the penultimate member of the actinide series.
elements.hrv_summary: Nobelij je sintetički kemijski element nazvan u čast Alfreda Nobela, izumitelja dinamita i dobročinitelja znanosti. Radioaktivni metal, deseti je transuranski element i predzadnji je član aktinidnog niza.

elements.name: Lawrencium, Lawrencij
elements.summary: Lawrencium is a synthetic chemical element and it is named in honor of Ernest Lawrence, inventor of the cyclotron, a device that was used to discover many artificial radioactive elements. A radioactive metal, lawrencium is the eleventh transuranic element and is also the final member of the actinide series.
elements.hrv_summary: Lawrencij je sintetički kemijski element nazvan u čast Ernesta Lawrencea, izumitelja ciklotrona, uređaja koji je korišten za otkrivanje mnogih umjetnih radioaktivnih elemenata. Radioaktivni metal, lawrencij je jedanaesti transuranski element i također je posljednji član aktinidnog niza.

elements.name: Rutherfordium, Rutherfordij
elements.summary: Rutherfordium, named in honor of physicist Ernest Rutherford. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, 267Rf, has a half-life of approximately 1.3 hours. In the periodic table of the elements, it is a d - block element and the second of the fourth - row transition elements.
elements.hrv_summary: Rutherfordij, nazvan u čast fizičara Ernesta Rutherforda, je sintetički element (element koji se može stvoriti u laboratoriju, ali se ne nalazi u prirodi) i radioaktivan; najstabilniji poznati izotop, 267Rf, ima poluživot od približno 1,3 sata. U periodnom sustavu elemenata, to je d-blok element i drugi od elemenata prijelazne serije četvrte redovine.

elements.name: Dubnium, Dubnij
elements.summary: Dubnium is named after the town of Dubna in Russia (north of Moscow), where it was first produced. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, dubnium-268, has a half-life of approximately 28 hours.
elements.hrv_summary: Dubnij je dobio ime po gradu Dubna u Rusiji (sjeverno od Moskve), gdje je prvi put proizveden. To je sintetički element (element koji se može stvoriti u laboratoriju, ali se ne nalazi u prirodi) i radioaktivan; najstabilniji poznati izotop, dubnij-268, ima poluživot od približno 28 sati.

elements.name: Seaborgium, Seaborgij
elements.summary: Seaborgium is a synthetic element, its most stable isotope 271Sg has a half-life of 1.9 minutes. A more recently discovered isotope 269Sg has a potentially slightly longer half-life.
elements.hrv_summary: Seaborgij je sintetički element, njegov najstabilniji izotop 271Sg ima poluživot od 1.9 minuta. Nedavno otkriveni izotop 269Sg ima potencijalno nešto duži poluživot.

elements.name: Bohrium, Bohrij
elements.summary: Bohrium is named after Danish physicist Niels Bohr. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and radioactive; the most stable known isotope, 270Bh, has a half-life of approximately 61 seconds.
elements.hrv_summary: Borij je dobio ime po danskom fizičaru Nielsu Bohru. To je sintetički element (element koji se može stvoriti u laboratoriju, ali se ne nalazi u prirodi) i radioaktivan; najstabilniji poznati izotop, 270Bh, ima poluživot od približno 61 sekundu.

elements.name: Hassium, Hassij
elements.summary: Hassium, named after Hesse, Germany, is a synthetic, radioactive element. Its most stable known isotope, 269Hs, has a half-life of about 9.7 seconds, though a potentially longer-lived metastable state, 277mHs, exists. Over 100 hassium atoms have been synthesized, primarily in laboratory settings.
elements.hrv_summary: Hassium, nazvan po Hessenu, Njemačka, je sintetički, radioaktivni element. Njegov najstabilniji poznati izotop, 269Hs, ima poluživot od oko 9.7 sekundi, iako postoji potencijalno dugovječno metastabilno stanje, 277mHs. Više od 100 atoma hassiuma je sintetizirano, uglavnom u laboratorijskim uvjetima.

elements.name: Meitnerium, Meitnerij
elements.summary: Meitnerium is an extremely radioactive synthetic element (an element not found in nature that can be created in a laboratory). The most stable known isotope, meitnerium-278, has a half-life of 7.6 seconds.
elements.hrv_summary: Meitnerij je izuzetno radioaktivni sintetički element (element koji se ne nalazi u prirodi i može se stvoriti u laboratoriju). Najstabilniji poznati izotop, meitnerij-278, ima poluživot od 7.6 sekundi.

elements.name: Darmstadtium, Dramštatij
elements.summary: Darmstadtium is an extremely radioactive synthetic element. The most stable known isotope, darmstadtium-281, has a half-life of approximately 10 seconds.
elements.hrv_summary: Darmštatij je izuzetno radioaktivni sintetički element. Najstabilniji poznati izotop, darmstadtij-281, ima poluživot od približno 10 sekundi.

elements.name: Roentgenium, Roentgenij
elements.summary: Roentgenium is an extremely radioactive synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature); the most stable known isotope, roentgenium-282, has a half-life of 2.1 minutes. Roentgenium was first created in 1994 by the GSI Helmholtz Centre for Heavy Ion Research near Darmstadt, Germany.
elements.hrv_summary: Roentgenij je izuzetno radioaktivan sintetički element (element koji se može stvoriti u laboratoriju, ali se ne nalazi u prirodi); najstabilniji poznati izotop, roentgenij-282, ima poluživot od 2.1 minute. Roentgenij je prvi put stvoren 1994. godine u GSI Helmholtz centru za istraživanje teških iona blizu Darmstadta, Njemačka.

elements.name: Copernicium, Kopernicij
elements.summary: Copernicium is a chemical element with symbol Cn and atomic number 112. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element that can only be created in a laboratory. The most stable known isotope, copernicium-285, has a half-life of approximately 29 seconds, but it is possible that this copernicium isotope may have a nuclear isomer with a longer half-life, 8.9 min.

elements.name: Nihonium, Nihonij
elements.summary: Nihonium has a symbol Nh. It is a synthetic element (an element that can be created in a laboratory but is not found in nature) and is extremely radioactive; its most stable known isotope, nihonium-286, has a half-life of 20 seconds.
elements.hrv_summary: Nihonij ima simbol Nh. To je sintetički element (element koji se može stvoriti u laboratoriju, ali se ne nalazi u prirodi) i izuzetno je radioaktivan; njegov najstabilniji poznati izotop, nihonij-286, ima poluživot od 20 sekundi.

elements.name: Flerovium, Flerovij
elements.summary: Flerovium is a superheavy artificial chemical element. It is an extremely radioactive synthetic element. The element is named after the Flerov Laboratory of Nuclear Reactions of the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia, where the element was discovered in 1998.
elements.hrv_summary: Flerovij je super-teški umjetni kemijski element. To je izuzetno radioaktivan sintetički element. Element je nazvan po Flerovovom laboratoriju nuklearnih reakcija Zajedničkog instituta za nuklearna istraživanja u Dubni, Rusija, gdje je element otkriven 1998. godine.

elements.name: Moscovium, Moskovij
elements.summary: Moscovium is an extremely radioactive element; its most stable known isotope, moscovium-289, has a half-life of only 220 milliseconds. It is also known as eka-bismuth or simply element 115.
elements.hrv_summary: Moscovium je izuzetno radioaktivan element; njegov najstabilniji poznati izotop, moscovium-289, ima poluživot od samo 220 milisekundi. Također je poznat kao eka-bizmut ili jednostavno element 115.

elements.name: Livermorium, Livermorij
elements.summary: Livermorium is a synthetic superheavy element. It is an extremely radioactive element that has only been created in the laboratory and has not been observed in nature. The element is named after the Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in the United States, which collaborated with the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia to discover livermorium in 2000.
elements.hrv_summary: Livermorij je sintetički super-teški element. To je izuzetno radioaktivan element koji je stvoren samo u laboratoriju i nije primijećen u prirodi. Element je dobio ime po Nacionalnom laboratoriju Lawrence Livermore u Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama, koji je surađivao s Zajedničkim institutom za nuklearna istraživanja u Dubni, Rusija, kako bi otkrio livermorij 2000. godine.

elements.name: Tennessine, Tenes
elements.summary: Tennessine is a superheavy artificial chemical element and it is the second-heaviest known element and penultimate element of the 7th period of the periodic table. As of 2016, fifteen tennessine atoms have been observed:six when it was first synthesized in 2010, seven in 2012, and two in 2014.
elements.hrv_summary: Tenes je super-teški umjetni kemijski element i drugi najteži poznati element te predzadnji element 7. perioda periodnog sustava. Do 2016. godine promatrano je petnaest atoma tenesa: šest kada je prvi put sintetiziran 2010., sedam 2012. i dva 2014. godine.

elements.name: Oganesson, Oganeson
elements.summary: Oganesson is IUPAC's name for the transactinide element. It is also known as eka-radon or element 118, and on the periodic table of the elements it is a p-block element and the last one of the 7th period. Oganesson is currently the only synthetic member of group 18.
elements.hrv_summary: Oganeson je IUPAC-ovo ime za transaktinidni element. Također je poznat kao eka-radon ili element 118, a na periodnom sustavu elemenata to je p-blok element i posljednji u 7. periodi. Oganeson je trenutno jedini sintetički član skupine 18.
